data.lyric:
[ti:GHOST TOWN]
[ar:Benson Boone]
[al:GHOST TOWN]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.12]GHOST TOWN - Benson Boone
[00:00.81]
[00:09.54]You fill me up 'til you're empty
[00:12.49]
[00:13.67]I took too much and you let me
[00:16.69]
[00:18.04]We've been down all these roads before
[00:21.10]
[00:21.84]And what we found don't live there anymore
[00:25.12]It's dark
[00:25.90]
[00:26.80]It's cold
[00:27.96]
[00:28.73]If my hand is not the one you're meant to hold
[00:32.37]
[00:33.96]Maybe you'd be happier with someone else
[00:38.09]Maybe loving me's the reason you can't love yourself
[00:42.20]Before I turn your heart into a ghost town
[00:45.71]
[00:46.24]Show me everything we built so I can tear it all down
[00:50.84]
[00:52.22]Down
[00:53.14]
[00:54.00]Down down down
[00:56.88]
[00:59.12]You know I'll stay don't you tempt me
[01:02.17]
[01:03.23]But all this weight is getting heavy
[01:06.19]
[01:07.31]Been holding up what wasn't meant to stand
[01:10.74]
[01:11.39]I turned this love into a wasteland
[01:14.76]It's dark
[01:15.29]
[01:16.52]It's cold
[01:17.39]
[01:18.44]If my hand is not the one you're meant to hold
[01:22.97]
[01:23.61]Maybe you'd be happier with someone else
[01:27.76]Maybe loving me's the reason you can't love yourself
[01:31.77]Before I turn your heart into a ghost town
[01:35.85]Show me everything we built so I can tear it all down
[01:40.51]
[01:41.85]Down
[01:42.61]
[01:43.73]Down down down
[01:46.42]
[01:46.99]Tear it all down
[01:48.51]
[01:49.84]Down
[01:51.07]
[01:52.13]Down down down
[01:54.79]
[02:05.31]The streets are empty
[02:07.46]
[02:09.17]Where love once was but it's faded away
[02:13.37]These broken memories
[02:15.69]
[02:17.33]I'm left here alone and afraid to say
[02:21.33]
[02:21.84]Maybe you'd be happier with someone else
[02:26.01]
[02:27.65]Ooh
[02:29.32]
[02:29.88]Maybe you'd be happier with someone else
[02:33.94]Maybe loving me's the reason you can't love yourself
[02:38.02]Before I turn your heart into a ghost town
[02:41.55]
[02:42.13]Show me everything we built so I can tear it all down
[02:46.63]
[02:48.10]Down
[02:48.67]
[02:49.86]Down down down
[02:53.12]Tear it all down
[02:54.70]
[02:55.95]Down
[02:57.39]
[02:58.05]Down down down
[03:01.39]I'll tear it all down
[03:03.13]
[03:07.27]I'll tear it all down
